chapters.title: Chapter 8:  Whirlpools of Color
chapters.info:
Natly (Nat)  Torfinn,
      p. 223 (260)—Blind,
      wrinkled old man with white hair that Perrin knew
      as a child.  He could disassemble any blacksmith's puzzle by touch.
      Perrin tried to do the same, but failed—he always needed to see
      how the pieces fit together to be able to get them apart.
